question: With reference to the entry of European powers into India, which one of the following statements is not correct?
option2: The English opened their first factory in South India at Masulipatam
option3: In Eastern India, the English Company opened its first factory in Orissa in 1633
option4: Under the leadership of Dupleix, the French occupied Madras in 1746
explanation: The Portuguese conquest of Goa occurred when the governor of Portuguese India Afonso de Albuquerque captured the city in 1510. Goa was not among the cities Albuquerque had received orders to conquer: he had only been ordered by the Portuguese king to capture Hormuz, Aden and Malacca.
